item.title: Best Practice: The Need For Platforms Rather Than Products
item.description:
Best Practice: The Need For Platforms Rather Than Products

By Peter Aylett, Archimedia Middle East. Back in 2010, I had a slide in one of my technology trends presentations that asked 'Are people making product choices or platform choices?' How far this has now evolved was really brought home to me a few days ago when I visited a customer for whom we had installed a system seven years ago.

item.title: Best Practice: Continued Integration Technology Evolution to Define 2016
item.description:
Best Practice: Continued Integration Technology Evolution to Define 2016

By Peter Aylett, Archimedia Middle East. My CEDIA Expo 2015 show report discussed a landscape of evolution rather than revolution. This sums up 2015 perfectly as a year where the industry has matured gracefully rather than taking any great leaps forward.
